description: Cooperative Missions are PvE missions where an individual party, or parties of player characters work to meet the mission objective of a storyline mission. Cooperative Missions are always a part of the storyline of a particular chapter, so feature a number of cinematics which not only explain the objectives and flesh out the story but provide context for the following quests. All missions may be accessed though Embark Beach, provided party members have been there prior.

items.name: Prophecies Normal
items.description: A standard difficulty mission run of the Prophecies campaign.

items.name: Prophecies Hard
items.description: A hard difficulty mission run of the Prophecies campaign.

items.name: Factions Normal
items.description: A standard difficulty mission run of the Factions campaign.

items.name: Factions Hard
items.description: A hard difficulty mission run of the Factions campaign.

items.name: Nightfall Normal
items.description: A standard difficulty mission run of the Nightfall campaign.

items.name: Nightfall Hard
items.description: A hard difficulty mission run of the Nightfall campaign.

items.name: EotN Normal
items.description: A standard difficulty mission run of the Eye of the North campaign.

items.name: EotN Hard
items.description: A hard difficulty mission run of the Eye of the North campaign.

items.name: Dungeon Normal
items.description: A standard difficulty dungeon run of the Eye of the North campaign.

items.name: Dungeon Hard
items.description: A hard difficulty dungeon run of the Eye of the North campaign.

description: The Vanquisher title tracks are granted to a character who clears all explorable areas of foes in hard mode. There is one single-tiered title track for each campaign. Acquiring all of them will complete the Legendary Vanquisher title track. These titles can be displayed in the "Honor" monument.

items.name: Vanquisher XS
items.description: Clearing a hard zone containing 0-100 foes.

items.name: Vanquisher S
items.description: Clearing a hard zone containing 100-200 foes.

items.name: Vanquisher M
items.description: Clearing a hard zone containing 200-300 foes.

items.name: Vanquisher L
items.description: Clearing a hard zone containing 300-400 foes.

items.name: Vanquisher XL
items.description: Clearing a hard zone containing 400+ foes.

description: Service to bring people to outposts and cities in various campaigns.

items.name: Lion's Arch
items.description: Westbound: If running to Lion's Arch, this allows Prophecies characters to quickly and easily travel to other campaigns.

items.name: Ascalon City
items.description: Eastbound: If running to Ascalon City, this allows non-Prophecies characters to get into Ascalon for cartography and mission purposes.

items.name: Sanctum Cay
items.description: Completing the Sanctum Cay mission allows access to the Crystal Desert in order for Prophecies characters to quickly ascend; although, it might be faster for Prophecies characters to ascend (i.e. become Weh no Su) in Factions if the account also has Factions.

items.name: Temple of the Ages
items.description: Allows access to The Fissure of Woe and The Underworld without using a corresponding passage scroll; however, characters must meet the prerequisites to enter those explorable areas.

items.name: Henge of Denravi
items.description: Allows access to Ventari's Refuge and Druid's Overlook.

items.name: Henge of Denravi
items.description: Allows access to Ventari's Refuge and Druid's Overlook.

items.name: Henge of Denravi
items.description: Allows access to Ventari's Refuge and Druid's Overlook.

items.name: Crystal Desert tour
items.description: The "Desert Tour" gives characters access to the four mission outposts in the Crystal Desert. This allows characters to quickly ascend, therefore gaining access to The Dragon's Lair and the Tomb of the Primeval Kings.

items.name: Droknar's Forge
items.description: The Droknar's Forge run provides early access to maximum-rating armor crafters in Prophecies. Only characters with a core primary profession can benefit from the armor that is crafted in this area.

items.name: Marhan's Grotto
items.description: Droknar's Forge → Marhan's Grotto - Provides access to prestige armor.

items.name: Granite Citadel
items.description: Droknar's Forge → Granite Citadel - Provides access to prestige armor.

items.name: Kaineng City tour
items.description: The Marketplace or Kaineng Center → Senji's Corner → Maatu Keep → Boreas Seabed. Allows characters to continue the campaign from the Boreas Seabed mission.

items.name: Jade Sea tour
items.description: Zos Shivros Channel → Cavalon and most other outposts in the Jade Sea region. Provides quick access to faction farming (i.e. competitive missions or speed clearing Mount Qinkai from Aspenwood Gate (Luxon)). The Sunjiang District mission can be skipped by running to Gyala Hatchery. Access to Harvest Temple requires completing the Unwaking Waters mission.

items.name: Echovald Forest tour
items.description: House zu Heltzer → Most outposts in the Echovald Forest region. Provides quick access to competitive missions for faction farming and to the outposts near where the primary quest The Defenders of the Forest takes place.

items.name: Vabbi tour
items.description: Sunspear Sanctuary → The Kodash Bazaar → Moddok Crevice. The "Vabbi Tour" provides access to the Kodash Bazaar Vabbian armor crafter much earlier than otherwise, and also to skip a mission and continue at Moddok Crevice.

items.name: Eye of the North tour
items.description: Eye of the North or Gunnar's Hold → All other towns and outposts in the campaign. The Eye of the North tour provides access to every outpost in the Eye of the North expansion for quick completion of the campaign quests and access to dungeons.

description: Speed run a character though the quickest way to complete a campaign.

items.name: Prophecies Rush
items.description: Rush through the Prophecies campaign in the fastest way possible.

items.name: Factions Rush
items.description: Rush through the Factions campaign in the fastest way possible.

items.name: Nightfall Rush
items.description: Rush through the Nightfall campaign in the fastest way possible.

items.name: Eye of the North Rush
items.description: Rush through the Eye of the North campaign in the fastest way possible.

description: Clear the hardest content of the game for you

items.name: Fissure of Woe
items.description: Complete all missions of the Fissure of Woe

items.name: Underworld
items.description: Complete all missions of the Underworld

items.name: Sorrow's Furnace
items.description: Defeat Iron Forgeman in Sorrow's Furnace

items.name: Urgoz's Warren
items.description: Defeat Urgoz in Urgoz's Warren

items.name: The Deep
items.description: Defeat Kanaxai in The Deep

items.name: DoA / Mallyx
items.description: Clear the 4 domains of anguish then defeat Mallyx the Unyielding in the final fight.

description: Other runs granting you access to specific services

items.name: Obsidian armor
items.description: Bring you to the Eternal Forgemaster in the Fissure of Woe to craft you obsidian armor.

items.name: Infusion
items.description: Bring you to the Ancient Seer to infuse your armor against the Mursaats.
